section.title: Tracking of changes in response to the 1st Public Review
section.para: This section tracks major changes made to this specification compared to the Committee Specification Draft 01 http://docs.oasis-open.org/xliff/xliff-core/v2.1/csprd01/xliff-core-v2.1-csprd01.html. The initial Public Review took place from 26th October 2016 until 25th November 2016.

listitem.para: Major changes were made in [core/modules/serializations/validation artifatcs] in response to Comments/Issues [Github Issues <ulinks> ]. [Additional info - optional].
Major changes were made in the Change Tracking Module and validation artifacts in response to Comment/Issue [Github Issues <ulinks> ]. [Additional info - optional].
Clarifications to Core with validation impact, non-of which were normative changes were provided in response to Comments/Issues: [Github Issues <ulinks> ]. [Additional info - optional].
Material clarification with validation impact was provided for [core/module/serialization faeture] in response to Comment/Issue: [Github Issues <ulinks> ]. [Additional info - optional].
Editorial changes have been made in response to Comments/Issues: [Github Issues <ulinks> ].
